snippet: The creators of the new ABC drama “Nashville” are not only seeking an accurate portrayal of the country music industry, they also want to get the city right.
abstract: Callie Khouri, writer of ABC television drama Nashville, says that it was important to her and her fellow executive producer R J Cutler to create an accurate portrayal of the country music industry and the city itself.
lead_paragraph: The creators of the new ABC drama “Nashville” are not only seeking an accurate portrayal of the country music industry, they also want to get the city right.

headline.seo: ‘Nashville,’ the TV Series Starring the City
headline.main: The Heartbeat, and the Twang, of a City
headline.print_headline: The Heartbeat, And the Twang, Of a City
